name: Kongregate Night Theme
description: Night theme for Kongregate. Consists mainly of 2 colors (#333 and #222) with a dull white text (#ddd). Easy on the eyes. Because there are only 3 colors (not counting the Kongregate red), it is easy to replace the colors to your liking.
additional_info:
Some elements with a white background were not restyled, as restyling it will cause the pictures to blend in with the background. But there are very few of these pictures, and one will rarely encounter them on a casual basis.

Changelog:
<u>2016</u>
July 31: Added opacity to the home roll and Kongregate header to dull it a bit. 
July 30: Added hover color to links and buttons.
